homepage.hero: Full-height or 80vh section with 'Esports Crowd' background, heavy black overlay (bg-black/80). Centered or left-aligned typography with 'Glitch' effect on main heading.
homepage.reviews_strip: Top of the page, thin bar or section. Trustpilot logo + 'Excellent' rating + 5 stars. Link to 'Check All Reviews'.
homepage.product_grid: Grid layout (grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 lg:grid-cols-5). Square aspect ratio cards. Image takes up 70% of card, details below.
homepage.marquee: Infinite scrolling marquee of 'Recent Purchases' or 'Supported Games' logos.

product_page.layout: Two-column layout. Left: Square Product Image (sticky). Right: Details, Variations (Radio Group), Price, 'Order Now' Button.
product_page.variations: Radio group or button group for selecting 'Plan', 'Duration', 'Region'. Selected state must be high-contrast Gold.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons (User, ShoppingCart, Menu, Star, Check, ChevronDown). Use 'react-icons/fa' for Socials (FaWhatsapp, FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaTiktok).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Ensure 'tailwind.config.js' has the custom colors (primary: #F5A623, background: #000000). Force dark mode by default.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'. Apply 'font-heading' to all headings and 'font-body' to text.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Reviews Strip' at the very top. It's a key trust signal.
4. PRODUCT CARDS: Make them SQUARE (aspect-square). This is a specific requirement. Image should fill most of the card.
5. WHATSAPP INTEGRATION: The 'Order Now' button on product pages must open a WhatsApp link with a pre-filled message (e.g., 'https://wa.me/9779743488871?text=I want to order...').
6. ADMIN PANEL: Keep it simple but functional. Use a table layout for products/reviews. Use a rich text editor (like 'react-quill' or simple textarea) for descriptions.
7. BACKGROUND: The background must be PITCH BLACK (#000000), not dark grey. Use dark grey only for cards/surfaces.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Ensure high contrast for text (White on Black).
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Rajdhani'.
